definitions.definition: A narrow strip running down a movie film that carries the recorded sound in synchronization with the pictures .
The sound (especially the music ) component of a movie, video game, etc.
A recording of such music for sale .
A background sound that is part of a larger event .

main_definition: A narrow strip running down a movie film that carries the recorded sound in synchronization with the pictures .
secondary_definitions: The sound (especially the music ) component of a movie, video game, etc.
A recording of such music for sale .
A background sound that is part of a larger event .
